tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_permissions (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    read_permission BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    write_permission BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    execute_permission BOOLEAN NOT NULL
)
CREATE TABLE user_permissions ( user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, permission_level VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE access_controls ( access_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, user_id UUID NOT NULL, access_level VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, granted_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, revoked_at TIMESTAMP );
CREATE TABLE sensor_data ( data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, sensor_id UUID NOT NULL, data_value DECIMAL NOT NULL, timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );
